nodes.text: A certain type of bell-shaped space yacht was used by the Hutts at some point before the start of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY. Those yachts had big entrance hatches, large enough for a masive Hutt to get in or out. The Huttese criminal Zorba Desilijic Tiure owned one, which he had christened the Zorba Express.

That class of bell-shaped yacht only appeared in Zorba the Hutt's Revenge and Queen of the Empire, the third and fourth installement of the so-called Jedi Prince book series. In those novels, it was only referred to as a "Huttian spaceship," but a Wizards of the Coast online article called Hutt! Hutt! Hutt! established the Zorba Express was an "ancient star yacht."
